name: Goddess of words
description:
Goddess of words was made in 48h during the IIM Summer Jam, a game jam organized by our school (Institute of Internet & Multimedia) for actual students, alumnis and professors. The theme was "jargon".

Be transported to the world of ancient Greece.

Our main character is an archeologist who found an ancient document while doing some researches near an old temple. But when she grabs the ancient scroll, she is teleported into the golden age of the temple.

Using words from the greek mythology jargon, she will have to fight Hades and his servants in order to restore peace and come back to her present.

How to play?

You can play the game by downloading it at the bottom of this page. Goddess of words can only be played with keyboard.

  • Move your character by using WASD or the arrows
  • When entering a fight:
    • Write the name of the spell you want to cast. For some of them, you will also have to write the enemy name that you want to attack
    • Press ENTER to validate
    • Be careful, the spells will cost you some energy ;)
